definition: merger and acquisition (M and A)/acquisition/to take over

sentences.english: The company changes to control medium company and be bought, it is a kind of means that asset recombines .
sentences.chinese: 企業改制中的企業併購，是資產重組的一種方式。

sentences.english: The company was previously known as Golden Harvest, but changed its name last year after a merger.
sentences.chinese: 橙天之前名爲嘉禾，去年公司併購後改名。

sentences.english: Transnational capital flows are the main factors of the company's cross-border M & A.
sentences.chinese: 資本流動的跨國性是界定公司跨國併購的主要因素。

sentences.english: Similar resist also impediment some large-scaled M&A deals.
sentences.chinese: 類似的抵抗破壞了中國的一些大型併購交易。

sentences.english: The same way travel is also the beneficiary of the merger.
sentences.chinese: 同程旅遊同樣是此次併購的受益方。

sentences.english: The third, M&A between main-system contractors was dominant.
sentences.chinese: 再次，主系統承包商的併購占主導地位。

sentences.english: So, is there any place to find deals?
sentences.chinese: 如此說來，還有什麼地方存在併購交易嗎？

sentences.english: Deutsche Bank AG advised Primus Financial on the acquisition.
sentences.chinese: 博智併購的諮詢爲德意志銀行。

sentences.english: Offering its review opinions on the matters in an application for merger, acquisition or restructuring.
sentences.chinese: 依法對併購重組申請事項提出審覈意見。

sentences.english: Cultural incompatibility is one of the critical factors which lead to the acquisition failure.
sentences.chinese: 文化的不相容性是導致併購失敗的關鍵因素之一。

sentences.english: These failures reflect non-efficiency issues in the process of M&A.
sentences.chinese: 一些併購的失敗也體現了併購過程中的非效率問題。

sentences.english: These failures reflect non-efficiency issues in the process of M&A.
sentences.chinese: 一些併購的失敗也體現了併購過程中的非效率問題。

sentences.english: It wouldn't be the first time government officials have rebuffed Xiang's overseas ambitions.
sentences.chinese: 這並非政府官員第一次回絕向文波的海外併購雄心。

sentences.english: In this paper, M & A Research-based starts the discussion.
sentences.chinese: 本文以企業併購問題研究爲基礎展開論述。

sentences.english: Merger&Acquistion(M&A) is an important capital-operating method.
sentences.chinese: 企業併購是市場經濟資本運營的重要方式。

sentences.english: The libraries subscribed to more than 8622 titles of local and overseas newspapers and periodicals.
sentences.chinese: 圖書館併購備了逾8622份本港及海外報章和期刊。

definition: to purchase (from various places)/to acquire (a company)
to inject funds/to put money into (the market)
tycoon/magnate/big player (including company, country, school etc)/big shot
to oversee/to take charge of/to supervise/to administer/supervisory/supervision
